English:
--------
Category: Design & Editing
Language: Multilingual including Spanish
Operating system: Windows XP, Vista, 7
Included: KeY

Description:
-------------
Ashampoo Home Designer Pro is a professional software for 3D planning with which they can plan and furnish a room, flat or even an entire house. For his project there is a wide range of elements, as well as large catalogs with objects, materials and textures available.

Features:

Using this software will not only build your dream home, but also easily design throughout the property. The landform almost realistic, with hills, slopes, ditches, etc. With the editor you can add a terrace, paths or beds (flower). Catalogues with garden furniture and plants are also available for individual garden design.

Ashampoo Home Designer Pro provides 2D and 3D view to see the results. This way you not only get a realistic view in 3D, but the exact plan of your project. Then you can print or save the results in different image file formats. If you already use Ashampoo Principal Designer, you will be able to import previous projects, and correct, supplement or complete Ashampoo Home Designer Pro

But do not worry if you do not have previous experience in the Home Designer Ashampoo. Getting started is easy and quick, Ashampoo Home Designer Pro provides a startup wizard. In an intuitive step-by-step process that will draw the floor plan of a room or on the floor and set the basic parameters of your project. In the Startup Wizard you can also view training videos or opening a sample project that can be edited in the editor.
Use the Home Designer Pro Ashampoo to plan, experiment and create a realistic image of your project without additional cost or mispurchases.

Software Highlights:
- Create and provide rooms or even a multi-storey house
- Launching the project and assistant
- Import Ashampoo Home design projects
- Design a garden with realistic landforms
- Interior furnishing, with large catalogs containing objects, textures and materials
- 2D and 3D Views
- Display realistic ray tracing, antialiasing, "soft" shadows and ambient occlusion
- Print or save the results to different image file formats
